lifestyle_section_copy.{{LIFESTYLE_HEADLINE_1}}: Turn Heads in Navy Blue Sparkle
lifestyle_section_copy.{{LIFESTYLE_BODY_1}}: Our Arina Rhinestone Dress was designed for women who want to stand out. Navy blue elegance meets gold rhinestone glamour - perfect for clubs, parties, and those moments when you want all eyes on you.

notes.source: ADAPTED from existing tagline 'Be Unforgettable in Navy Blue Sparkle'
notes.existing_copy: Dazzling navy blue rhinestone bodycon mini dress with gold crystal accents. Perfect for clubs, parties & special events.

problem_section.{{PROBLEM_HEADLINE}}: Why Women Are Ditching Basic Black Dresses
problem_section.{{PROBLEM_1}}: No more blending in with every other girl in black
problem_section.{{PROBLEM_2}}: No more boring, forgettable party outfits
problem_section.{{PROBLEM_3}}: No more cheaply-made dresses that lose sparkle
problem_section.{{PROBLEM_4}}: No more uncomfortable bodycon that rolls up
problem_section.{{PROBLEM_5}}: No more dresses that photograph poorly in club lighting

solution_section.{{SOLUTION_HEADLINE}}: The Dress That Makes You Unforgettable
solution_section.{{SOLUTION_1}}: Stand out in stunning navy blue with gold rhinestones
solution_section.{{SOLUTION_3}}: Comfortable stretch fabric that stays in place all night
solution_section.{{SOLUTION_4}}: Square neckline + perfect slit length = FLATTERING
solution_section.{{SOLUTION_5}}: Photographs beautifully in any lighting (club, flash, natural)

notes.emoji: Use ‚úÖ emoji for each solution bullet in template

story_section.{{STORY_HEADLINE}}: Why We Created the Arina Dress
story_section.{{STORY_PARAGRAPH_1}}: We got tired of seeing amazing women disappear into a sea of basic black dresses at every party. You deserve to be unforgettable. That's why we created the Arina Rhinestone Dress - the perfect blend of navy blue elegance and gold sparkle glamour.
story_section.{{STORY_PARAGRAPH_2}}: Every rhinestone is hand-placed. Every curve is carefully designed for the perfect fit. This isn't just another party dress - it's the dress that makes you feel like the main character. Because you are.

notes.source: NEEDS GENERATION - No founder story currently exists
notes.gap: Current site has NO brand story section - LOW PRIORITY

banner_1.{{BANNER_SUBHEADLINE_1}}: Join thousands of women who refuse to blend in

banner_2.{{BANNER_SUBHEADLINE_2}}: Navy blue elegance meets gold rhinestone glamour

notes.source: NEEDS GENERATION - No full-width overlay banners currently exist

notes.selection_criteria: Wide/dramatic shots, good for text overlay with dark overlay

faq_section.{{FAQ_ANSWER_1}}: Absolutely! The stretch fabric is incredibly forgiving and hugs your curves beautifully. We offer sizes XS-XXL, and the bodycon fit adapts to your body. Check our size guide for measurements.
faq_section.{{FAQ_QUESTION_2}}: Will the rhinestones fall off or lose sparkle?
faq_section.{{FAQ_ANSWER_2}}: Nope! Each rhinestone is premium quality and securely attached. We've tested this dress through hundreds of wears. Hand wash cold and the sparkle stays perfect.
faq_section.{{FAQ_ANSWER_3}}: YES! Unlike stiff party dresses, the stretch fabric moves with you. The square neckline stays in place, the slit is the perfect length, and you can dance all night without adjusting.
faq_section.{{FAQ_QUESTION_4}}: Is the navy blue pretty or just looks black?
faq_section.{{FAQ_ANSWER_4}}: It's definitely navy! So much more interesting than basic black. The navy blue shows beautifully in natural light and photographs amazingly. The gold rhinestones pop even more against the navy.
faq_section.{{FAQ_ANSWER_5}}: Keep it simple - the dress IS the statement! Add nude heels, gold jewelry, and you're done. The gold rhinestones already provide all the sparkle you need.

review_4.{{REVIEW_TEXT_4}}: I wore it to a club for NYE and literally every person asked where I got it. The bodycon fit is so flattering

review_5.{{REVIEW_TEXT_5}}: chef's kiss. The thigh-high slit is the perfect length - sexy but classy. Already planning my next event to wear it again!

review_6.{{REVIEW_TEXT_6}}: I was worried it would be uncomfortable but the stretch fabric is amazing. Danced all night and it stayed perfect üëå

review_7.{{REVIEW_TEXT_7}}: The rhinestones sparkle in photos!! Got so many likes on IG. This dress was made for going out

review_8.{{REVIEW_TEXT_8}}: You can tell this is high quality. The rhinestones are secure, fabric feels expensive, and the fit is chef's kiss

review_9.{{REVIEW_TEXT_9}}: I've worn cheaper party dresses and they don't compare. This one is WORTH IT. The navy + gold is stunning
